entries.title: Survey: Two-thirds of Americans fear inflation will worsen
entries.description: (The Center Square) – Two out of every three Americans fear inflation will be worse in 2023 than it was last year, prompting nearly 90% of respondents overall in a new WalletHub survey to admit they are now concerned about the issue.

entries.title: Sinema leans on California to join Colorado River water pact
entries.description: (The Center Square)- As six states wait for California to join its Colorado River Basin water use agreement, Arizona Sen. Kyrsten Sinema called on the state to be willing to seal the deal.
